actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Weicker. Without written report.
Referred to Senate Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici favorably without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 265.

official_title: An original resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.1533.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 1533 (Legal Services Corporation funding).

titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.1533.
